tool_description: Compares soil testing results across multiple projects, locations, or time periods, identifying trends, differences, and similarities in soil properties and behavior.

comparison_parameters.description: Soil parameters to compare across datasets

comparison_type.description: Type of comparison: statistical, visual, or detailed

grouping_variable.description: Variable to group data by (location, depth, soil_type, etc.)

normalization.description: Apply normalization for parameters with different scales

error_messages: Invalid dataset names: One or more datasets do not exist or are empty.
Unknown comparison parameters: One or more parameters are not available in all datasets.
Unsupported comparison type: Use one of [statistical, visual, detailed].
Invalid grouping variable: Specified variable is not available in the datasets.
Insufficient data: Need at least 2 datasets with overlapping parameters for comparison.
usage: Specify dataset_names, comparison_parameters, and comparison_type to compare soil data. Optionally set grouping_variable and enable normalization for better analysis.

comparison_summary.description: Overall comparison results and key findings

similarity_scores.description: Similarity scores between dataset pairs (0-1 scale)

trend_analysis.description: Identified trends across the compared datasets
